This study initiate investigator , open , prospective , randomize , single center design compare safety efficacy two immunosuppressive regimen base thymoglobulin , tacrolimus everolimus versus thymoglobulin , tacrolimus mycophenolate sodium renal transplant recipient donor criterion expand .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Two Tacrolimus-based Immunosuppressant Regimens Induction With Thymoglobulin Kidney Transplants From Deceased Donors With Expanded Criteria
DOC.criteria: Adults ( > 18 year ) candidate renal transplant expand criterion deceased donor ; Low risk acute rejection , define first kidney transplant recipient Panel Reactive Antibody ( PRA ) < 50 % . Signature informed consent form ( ICF ) Patients receive immunosuppressive therapy transplantation ; Patients receive investigational drug within last 30 day ; Patients know contraindication administration antithymocyte globulin ; Patients positive test human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) ; Patients cancer ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer ) within last two year ; Pregnant woman , breastfeed woman , woman childbearing potential unwilling use condom oral contraceptive exclude ; Patients Panel Reactive Antibody ( PRA ) equal high 50 % , class I class II , also exclude ; Patients positive test parasite ( protozoa helminth ) .
